theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Change the theme of the app

language.title: Language
language.description: Change the language of the app

share_servers_with_others.title: Share Servers with Others
share_servers_with_others.description: Share the STUN and TURN servers with others when generating the join URL

background_image.title: Background Image
background_image.description: Change the background image of the app, also can be selected in the file cache

background_image_opacity.title: Background Image Opacity
background_image_opacity.description: Change the opacity of the background image

auto_join.title: Auto join
auto_join.description: Auto join a room when the app is launched

stun_servers.title: STUN Servers
stun_servers.description: Change the STUN servers of the app

turn_servers.title: TURN Servers
turn_servers.description: Change the TURN servers of the app, if you want to use this app in a NAT environment, you may need to set up TURN servers

websocket_url.title: Websocket URL
websocket_url.description: Change the Websocket URL of the app, this option is only available when the backend is WebSocket

enable_clipboard.title: Enable Clipboard
enable_clipboard.description: Enable the clipboard sending function of the sender, after enabling, you can send the clipboard content by pressing Ctrl + V on the chat window, and on mobile devices, you can send it by pasting into the information input box
enable_clipboard.unsupported: Clipboard is not supported, please use in a secure context

num_channels.title: NO. of Channels
num_channels.description: The number of channels of the sender, appropriate adjustment may improve the transfer speed

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: The size of each chunk of the sender

block_size.title: Block Size
block_size.description: The size of each block of the sender

max_buffer_amount.title: Max Buffer Amount
max_buffer_amount.description: The max buffer amount of the sender

ordered.title: Ordered
ordered.description: When enabled, the sender will send blocks in order

compression_level.title: Compression Level
compression_level.description: Change the compression level of the sender, 0 means no compression, 9 means maximum compression, enabling this option may reduce the transfer speed for compressed files

max_cached_chunks.title: Max Cached Chunks
max_cached_chunks.description: Change the max cached chunks of the receiver

media.title: Media Settings
media.description: Change the media settings of the app

camera.title: Camera
camera.description: Change the camera of the media

microphone.title: Microphone
microphone.description: Change the microphone of the media

speaker.title: Speaker
speaker.description: Change the speaker of the media

request_permission.title: Request Media Permission
request_permission.description: Request media permission to use the media settings, if you can't select the media devices after requesting permission, please try to refresh the page
request_permission.fallback_description: Please allow the browser to use the camera and microphone

video_max_bitrate.title: Video Max Bitrate
video_max_bitrate.description: Change the video max bitrate of the stream

audio_max_bitrate.title: Audio Max Bitrate
audio_max_bitrate.description: Change the audio max bitrate of the stream

404.title: 404 Not Found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist, path: {{path}}

index.description: Scan the QR code or share the link to connect to this room, right-click to copy the link
index.guide_title: Create or connect to a room
index.guide_description: You can create a new room or connect to an existing room by clicking the button on the top right corner

message_editor.placeholder: Ctrl + Enter or Shift + Enter to send the message

video.no_support_description: Please use this function in a secure context

browser_unsupported.title: Sorry, your browser is not supported

reasons.browser_version_too_low: Your browser version is too low
reasons.browser_does_not_support_webrtc: Your browser does not support WebRTC

browser_unsupported.description: Please use a modern browser like Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, or Opera. Or turn on the experimental WebRTC features in your browser

join_form.title: Edit Room Info
join_form.description: Edit the room info here. Click submit to finish editing.

client_id.title: Client ID (Read Only)
client_id.description: The client ID of the room, representing your identity, which can be changed in settings

room_id.title: Room ID
room_id.description: The room ID of the room

join_form.name: Name

confirm_delete_files_dialog.title: Delete Files
confirm_delete_files_dialog.content: Are you really sure you want to delete these files?

confirm_delete_client_dialog.title: Delete Client
confirm_delete_client_dialog.description: This operation deletes the client and messages
confirm_delete_client_dialog.content: Are you really sure you want to delete this client?

reset_options_dialog.title: Reset Options
reset_options_dialog.description: This operation resets the options to default values
reset_options_dialog.content: Are you really sure you want to reset the options?

send_item_preview_dialog.title: Send Item
send_item_preview_dialog.description: Are you sure you want to send file {{fileName}} to {{name}}?

scan_qrcode_dialog.title: Scan QR Code
scan_qrcode_dialog.description: Scan QR Code to connect to this room
scan_qrcode_dialog.tip: Right-click or long press to copy the link
scan_qrcode_dialog.invite: Invite you to join the room {{room}}

about_dialog.title: About Weblink
about_dialog.description1: Weblink is a WebRTC-based file transfer tool that helps you transfer files quickly and securely.
about_dialog.description2: This project provides end-to-end encryption, serverless architecture, and various advanced features to ensure your data security and privacy.
about_dialog.features: Key features include real-time text chat, file transfer, file cache, video calls.
about_dialog.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This application is for learning and research purposes only. The server does not store any user data, and users should bear the risks of using it at their own risk, and the developers are not responsible for any data loss or privacy breaches.
about_dialog.star_repo: If you like this project, please give me a ⭐ on GitHub!
about_dialog.author: Author
